verses.verse: A Psalm<WH4210> of Asaph.<WH623> God<WH430> standeth<WH5324> in the congregation<WH5712> of the mighty;<WH410> he judgeth<WH8199> among<WH7130> the gods.<WH430>
How long<WH5704> <WH4970> will ye judge<WH8199> unjustly,<WH5766> and accept<WH5375> the persons<WH6440> of the wicked?<WH7563> Selah.<WH5542>
Defend <WH8199> the poor<WH1800> and fatherless:<WH3490> do justice<WH6663> to the afflicted<WH6041> and needy.<WH7326>
Deliver <WH6403> the poor<WH1800> and needy:<WH34> rid<WH5337> them out of the hand<WH4480> <WH3027> of the wicked.<WH7563>

They know<WH3045> not,<WH3808> neither<WH3808> will they understand;<WH995> they walk on<WH1980> in darkness:<WH2825> all<WH3605> the foundations<WH4146> of the earth<WH776> are out of course.<WH4131>
I <WH589> have said,<WH559> Ye are gods;<WH430> and all<WH3605> of you<WH859> are children<WH1121> of the most High.<WH5945>
But <WH403> ye shall die<WH4191> like men,<WH120> and fall<WH5307> like one<WH259> of the princes.<WH8269>
Arise, <WH6965> O God,<WH430> judge<WH8199> the earth:<WH776> for<WH3588> thou<WH859> shalt inherit<WH5157> all<WH3605> nations.<WH1471>
